item.title: send slack message from command line
item.description: Install Incomming webhook to your channel https://api.slack.com/incoming-webhooks#sending_messages you will then get some url https://hooks.slack.com/services/T00000000/B00000000/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX create /usr/local/bin/notifyme #!/bin/sh curl -X POST --data-urlencode "payload={\"channel\": \"#alert\", \"username\": \"mybot\", \"text\": \"$*\", \"icon_emoji\": \":name_badge:\"}" https://hooks.slack.com/services/T00000000/B00000000/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX and send message via your command line $ chmod +x /usr/local/bin/notifyme $ notifyme hello world! # or after some command $ sleep 5; notifyme process is finished
